attributes.action: Make Liverpool/merseyside a independent state which remains in the eu.
attributes.background: After voting to remain in the eu we want to stay there.

rejection.details:
A new independent state would have to apply for EU membership. A decision about whether to grant membership would be for the EU, not the Government or Parliament, to take. You can find out more about this here:

https://ec.europa.eu/neighbourhood-enlargement/policy/conditions-membership_en
